name: stock_index_trend
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance_v2.
Tool description: Yahoo Finance API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds and news. Moved to: https://rapidapi.com/sparior/api/mboum-finance
API description: Fetch the index trend earnings history information for a specific stock symbol from the Yahoo Finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch the index trend data for.
